Sentencas: The performance of composite electrodes as a function of the electrode composition is investigated experimentally through electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS).
Titulo: Characterisation of composite SOFC cathodes using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy. Analysis of Pt/YSZ and LSM/YSZ electrodes

Sentencas: In particular, two different composite cathodes are analysed, i.e. Pt/YSZ and LSM/YSZ.
Titulo: Characterisation of composite SOFC cathodes using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy. Analysis of Pt/YSZ and LSM/YSZ electrodes

Sentencas: Typical impedance spectra have been obtained and used to evaluate the overall electrode polarisation resistance R-p.
Titulo: Characterisation of composite SOFC cathodes using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy. Analysis of Pt/YSZ and LSM/YSZ electrodes

Sentencas: The qualitative features are similar for both cathodes in particular, in both cases the electrode performance (expressed in terms of R-p(-1)) shows a dome-shaped curve as a function of the electrode composition.
Titulo: Characterisation of composite SOFC cathodes using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy. Analysis of Pt/YSZ and LSM/YSZ electrodes
Characterisation of composite SOFC cathodes using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy. Analysis of Pt/YSZ and LSM/YSZ electrodes

Sentencas: the quantitative aspects are very different: in particular.
Titulo: Characterisation of composite SOFC cathodes using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy. Analysis of Pt/YSZ and LSM/YSZ electrodes

Sentencas: the maximum value of R-p(-1) is much higher for the LSM/YSZ electrode than for the Pt/YSZ one (22 vs. 1.5 S cm(-2)).
Titulo: Characterisation of composite SOFC cathodes using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy. Analysis of Pt/YSZ and LSM/YSZ electrodes

Sentencas: Also, the composition which gives the maximum performance and the experimental values of the percolation thresholds are different.
Titulo: Characterisation of composite SOFC cathodes using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy. Analysis of Pt/YSZ and LSM/YSZ electrodes

Sentencas: The reasons for the discrepancies are analysed and discussed.
Titulo: Characterisation of composite SOFC cathodes using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy. Analysis of Pt/YSZ and LSM/YSZ electrodes
